mapper.select: SELECT cu.CD_USER_ID, cu.USER_NAME, cup.SALT, cup.PWD FROM cd_user cu LEFT JOIN cd_user_pwd cup ON cup.CD_USER_ID = cu.CD_USER_ID WHERE cu.USER_NAME = #{userName};
SELECT cr.* FROM cd_user_role cur LEFT JOIN cd_role cr ON cr.cd_role_ID = cur.cd_role_ID WHERE cur.CD_USER_ID = #{cdUserId}

SELECT cw.* FROM cd_user cu LEFT JOIN cd_user_warehouse cuw ON cuw.CD_USER_ID = cu.cd_user_ID LEFT JOIN cd_warehouse cw ON cw.CD_WAREHOUSE_ID = cuw.CD_WAREHOUSE_ID WHERE cu.CD_USER_ID = #{cdUserId} AND cw.IS_ACTIVE = 1

SELECT cc.* FROM cd_user cu LEFT JOIN cd_user_warehouse cuw ON cuw.CD_USER_ID = cu.CD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN cd_warehouse cw ON cw.CD_WAREHOUSE_ID = cuw.CD_WAREHOUSE_ID LEFT JOIN cd_country cc ON cc.COUNTRY_CODE = cw.COUNTRY_CODE WHERE cu.CD_USER_ID = #{cdUserId} GROUP BY cc.COUNTRY_CODE

SELECT cr.MENU_CATE, cr.CATEGORY, cu.USER_NAME FROM cd_user cu LEFT JOIN cd_user_role cur ON cur.CD_USER_ID = cu.CD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN cd_res_role crr ON crr.CD_ROLE_ID = cur.CD_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN cd_resource cr ON cr.CD_RESOURCE_ID = crr.CD_RESOURCE_ID WHERE cr.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND cr.MENU_CATE != 0 AND cr.DESCPT = 'SYSTEM_MENU' AND cu.USER_NAME = #{userName} GROUP BY cr.CATEGORY ORDER BY cr.MENU_CATE

SELECT cr.RESOURCE_NAME, cr.RESOURCE_URL, cr.MENU_ORDER FROM cd_user cu LEFT JOIN cd_user_role cur ON cur.CD_USER_ID = cu.CD_USER_ID LEFT JOIN cd_res_role crr ON crr.CD_ROLE_ID = cur.CD_ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN cd_resource cr ON cr.CD_RESOURCE_ID = crr.CD_RESOURCE_ID WHERE cr.IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND cr.DESCPT = 'SYSTEM_MENU' AND cr.MENU_CATE = #{menuCate} AND cu.USER_NAME = #{userName} GROUP BY RESOURCE_NAME ORDER BY MENU_ORDER;
